    • Method Detail

      • getFormId

        public java.lang.String getFormId()
        Description copied from interface: IYRCComposite
        Returns the form id of the form.
        Specified by:
        getFormId in interface IYRCComposite
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of a form. It should be a unique id across the application. Note:

        The statndard is to give the fully qualified classpath of the class file. For example, "<Package>.<Class_Name>"

        Form id is used for various purposes. They are:
        • As a unique identifier for the form.
        • In extensibility for adding extended controls.
        • For setting contexts for forms. Setting context enables the key bindings specified for the form.
        • Storing api output templates on the application server.

      • getPanelHolder

        public IYRCPanelHolder getPanelHolder()
        Specified by:
        getPanelHolder in interface IYRCComposite
        Returns:
        The panel holder for the form. It is the editor in which the current form is being displayed.

        Note: null can be returned as a valid argument.

      • showMessage

        public void showMessage(int type,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: IYRCStoreStatusWindow
        Method displyas the message passed. Based on the type text properties and icons are read form the theme file. If type=ERROR uses "ErrorColor" as theme and "ErrorIcon" as icon If type=WARNING uses "WarningColor" as theme and "WarningIcon" as icon If type=INFORMATION uses "InformationColor" as theme and "InformtionIcon" as icon
        Specified by:
        showMessage in interface IYRCStoreStatusWindow
        See Also:
        YRCShellConstants
